name: Elliott Associates
overview: Elliott Associates started at ground level as a Property Management company and grew into a full-service firm that now provides Asset Management, Investment Sales, Leasing Services, Accounting Services, and Facilities Services. They believe the breadth of their services and the depth of their experience is crucial to providing clients with an all-inclusive approach to their real estate assets. Because they have proven experience and resources in every aspect of the commercial real estate industry, they oversee their client’s assets in a way that no one else can.

funding_round.source_description: Tagsys, developer of RFID (Radio Frequency Identification) systems, announced this week the completion of its fifth round of funding for $35 million
